value:
Remembering what happened at the
orphanage is...difficult. It's painful.

I lived with my parents until I was
three years old. My father was a
skilled mercenary.

They say that Lord Raymond has a
sister who was taken in and raised by
Count Caerleon at a young age...

Poverty and despair can eat one's
very soul if it is not strengthened with
faith. But many people can't do that.

People's hearts can be twisted
so easily... The orphanage was no
exception.$k$pI pray that salvation comes for us all.

You must be $Nu.$k$pI've come with greetings from your
friend $Nf.

I want to become a proper monk, to
repay my debt to the marquess and
his wife, and to support Raymond!

I am feeling fine. But thank you for
your concern.
I won't be of much use like this...

Oh, thank you. But I have nothing to
give you in return...

My name is Lucius. I'm a monk in
service of the marquess of Cornwell.
Saint Elimine's light guides me.

I've already told you that I was an
orphan, haven't I, Summoner?$k$pOne night, my father was attacked by
bandits who broke into our home.$k$pThough he was a skilled mercenary,
he was killed right in front of me. I
remember it so clearly...$k$pThe bandit's eyes, as black as the
deepest darkness... The knife in my
father's chest... Ugh...$k$pAfter my father died, my mother fell
ill, and in no time at all, I was alone.$k$pIf I could pray for one thing, it would
be to reduce such suffering in the
world, even a little...
Stop the fighting!
I have to get stronger!
The light of salvation!
Be brave!
Forgive me...
I just know I can save you!
Anything to help.
Nice to meet you. I am Lucius, a retainer to House Cornwell.
The marquess and his wife, and of course Lord Raymond, are all near and dear to my heart.
Just...one moment. *sigh* No need to worry. My sickness has passed.
My memories of the orphanage are mostly painful ones.
I wonder why I feel so calm around you?
Right, then.
Uh... Yes!
On we go.
